question:
Match the following:  
A. Argentite 1. Copper
B. Bauxite 2. Iron
C. Haematite 3. Aluminium
D. Cuprite 4. Silver

A B C D
explanation:
• Silver is extracted from the ore-argentite. The process of extraction of silver is called as cyanide process as sodium cyanide solution is used.
• Bauxite is primarily comprised of aluminum oxide compounds.
• Haematite ore is mined as the main ore of iron.
• Cuprite is an oxide mineral composed of copper oxide Cu2O, and is a minor ore of copper.
